commit message:
Fixes an issue where oversized icons could break the layout.
Fixes another issue where long text would cause the status icon to be displayed improperly.

Fixed an error in sources.json causing Xposed apps to obtain an erroneous download URL.
The icon resize now determines the target size based on the screen density, making it a lot more reliable across devices.
Fixed a crash in `onResume()` caused by weidly being called without `onPause` in some situations.
Removed deprecated call to `getNetworkInfo`.

Version bump to 2.0.1.
Updated the changelog.
App deletions now also remove icons from the database.
